EnterHuntMode_SecondsToCharge.Description: Base time, in seconds, required for the Legion to enter Hunt mode.

Mend_SecondsToCharge.Description: Base time, in seconds, required to mend a survivor in injured bleed out.

MendSelf_SecondsToCharge.Description: Base time, in seconds, required for a survivor in injured bleed out to mend himself. Note that there is not MendSelf chargeable. Instead, we use this value to simulate one by setting the speed modifier of the MendSelf interaction.

MendSelf_SkillCheckChance.Description: % chance to trigger a skill check during the MendSelf interaction. This is rolled every second.

MendOther_SkillCheckChance.Description: % chance to trigger a skill check during the MendOther interaction. This is rolled every second.

Mend_TwoPlayerPenalty.Description: Percentage subtracted from the charge rate of a Mend interaction when two players are performing it

Mend_ThreePlayerPenalty.Description: Percentage subtracted from the charge rate of a Mend interaction when three players are performing it

InjuredBleedoutKOIndicatorLifetime.Description: Duration of the indicator bubble when a camper is KO by bleedout
